title: poha
ingredients: 1½ cup poha, 1 tsp sugar1 tsp sugar, ¾ tsp salt¾ tsp salt, 2 tbsp oil2 tbsp oil,2 tbsp peanuts2 tbsp peanuts,1 tsp mustard1 tsp mustard,1 tsp cumin / jeera1 tsp cumin / jeera,pinch hing / asafoetidapinch hing / asafoetida,few curry leavesfew curry leaves,1 onion, finely chopped1 onion, finely chopped,2 chilli, finely chopped2 chilli, finely chopped,¼ tsp turmeric¼ tsp turmeric,2 tbsp coconut, grated2 tbsp coconut, grated,2 tbsp coriander, finely chopped2 tbsp coriander, finely chopped,2 tsp lemon juice2 tsp lemon juice.
method: firstly, add 1 tsp sugar and ¾ tsp salt on soaked poha and mix gently.in a large kadai heat 2 tbsp oil and roast  2 tbsp peanuts on low flame.roast until the peanuts turn crunchy. keep aside.in the same oil, splutter 1 tsp mustard, 1 tsp cumin, pinch hing and few curry leaves.further add 1 onion, 2 chilli and saute well.saute until onions shrink slightly without browning.further, add ¼ tsp turmeric and saute well.add in soaked poha and mix gently until everything is combined well.cover and simmer for 5 minutes or until the flavours are absorbed well.also add 2 tbsp coconut, 2 tbsp coriander and 2 tsp lemon juice. mix gently.finally, enjoy kanda poha topped with some sev.
